Detailed Description

Describes the view of a TabButton.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TabButtonView::TabButtonView (  XYDIM  default_height,
XYDIM  default_width = -1,
XYDIM  min_width = -1,
XYDIM  max_width = -1,
XYDIM  clipped_width = 20
) 
 

Parameters:
default_height Default height of the button. If -1 is used, the height of the client font is used as default setting.
default_width Default width of the button. If -1 is used, the buttons are stretched in a way that all buttons are visible inside the available tab control width.
min_width Defines the minimum width a tab button may have. If a value < 1 is used, a minimum of 1 is assumed. Note that when the header line is turned on by TabControl::SetHeaderEnabled(TRUE), the minimum width is used for the width of the tab buttons instead of the default width, as the tab button will not contain any text.
max_width Defines the maximum width a tab button may have. If a value < 1 is used, no maximum is given.
clipped_width If not all tab buttons fit into the tab control width, the clipped_width describes the preferred width of the clipped tab button on the left or right.
